attributes.action: Hold talks with Scottish Power to scrap or find other alternative to the Prepayment Meter. The prepayment meter cost too much for those who use it and especially the worry in "topping up." It's too expensive, very inconvenient and causes more poverty in families.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Prepayment Meter is a disaster.
It's too expensive, very inconvenient and causes more poverty in families.
People discriminate you because you are on a prepayment meter.
You worry all the time in case the credit runs out and you have to go out to top it up.
Scottish Power should find an alternative to the prepayment meter. In this day and age in Britain, prepayment meters are not a an alternative to paying for our electricity. Using electricity is not like using our mobiles. The Government and electricity/gas companies should hold regular talks on how they could serve Britain and it's people. Citizens must also take action and save energy!!
